Name: True Thrust

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 . Combo Action: True Thrust Combo Potency: 350
Name: Vorpal Thrust

Description: Ensures critical damage for first weaponskill used while Life Surge is active. Duration: 5s Effect cannot be applied to damage over time. Additional Effect: Absorbs a portion of damage dealt as HP
Name: Life Surge

Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100. Combo Action: Vorpal Thrust Combo Potency: 530
Combo Bonus: Grants Sharper Fang and Claw if under the effect of
Name: Full Thrust

Description: Increases damage dealt by 15%. Duration: 20s
Name: Lance Charge

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 170 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Name: Doom Spike

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 . Combo Action: True Thrust Combo Potency: 320 Combo Bonus: Increases damage dealt by 10% Duration: 30s
Name: Disembowel

Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100. 140 when executed from a target's rear. Combo Action: Disembowel Combo Potency: 290 Rear Combo Potency: 330 Combo Bonus: Damage over time Potency: 50 Duration: 24s
Combo Bonus: Grants Enhanced Wheeling Thrust if under the effect of
Name: Chaos Thrust

Description: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.
Name: Piercing Talon

Description:
Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 310. Returns you to your original position after the attack is made. Additional Effect: Grants Dive Ready

Duration: 15s

Cannot be executed while bound.
Name: Jump

Description:
Executes a jump to a location 15 yalms behind you.

Cannot be executed while bound.
Name: Elusive Jump

Description:
Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 240.

Cannot be executed while bound.
Name: Spineshatter Dive

Description:
Delivers a jumping fire-based attack with a potency of 380 to target and all enemies nearby it.

Cannot be executed while bound.
Name: Dragonfire Dive

Description:
Increases potency of High Jump and Spineshatter Dive by 30%.

Duration:
Additional Effect: Grants Sharper Fang and Claw upon successfully executing Full Thrust, or Enhanced Wheeling Thrust upon successfully executing Chaos Thrust

Duration: 10s

Effects end upon use or upon using a weaponskill other than Fang and Claw or Wheeling Thrust.
Cannot be executed while under the effect of Life of the Dragon.
Name: Blood of the Dragon

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 340. 380 when executed from a target's flank. Can only be executed while under the effects of Sharper Fang and Claw and either Blood of the Dragon or Life of the Dragon . Additional Effect: Extends Blood of the Dragon duration by 10s to a maximum of 30s
Name: Fang and Claw

Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all enemies in a straight line before you. Can only be executed while under the effect of Blood of the Dragon.
Additional Effect: Changes Blood of the Dragon to Life of the Dragon while under the full gaze of the first brood



※Action changes to Nastrond while under the effect of Life of the Dragon.
Name: Geirskogul

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 340. 380 when executed from a target's rear. Can only be executed while under the effects of Enhanced Wheeling Thrust and either Blood of the Dragon or Life of the Dragon . Additional Effect: Extends Blood of the Dragon duration by 10s to a maximum of 30s
Name: Wheeling Thrust

Description: Increases critical hit rate of self and nearby party members by 10%. Duration: 20s
Name: Battle Litany

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you. Combo Action: Doom Spike Combo Potency: 200 Combo Bonus: Extends Blood of the Dragon duration by 10s to a maximum of 30s
Name: Sonic Thrust

Description: Grants Right Eye to self, increasing damage dealt by 10%. Also grants target party member Left Eye, increasing damage dealt by 5% as long as target remains within 12 yalms. Duration: 20s
Name: Dragon Sight

Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300. Additional Effect: Strengthens the gaze of your Dragon Gauge by 1 if under the effect of Blood of the Dragon or Life of the Dragon

Can only be executed when Dive Ready.
Name: Mirage Dive

Description: Instantly restores own HP. Cure Potency: 500
Name: Second Wind

Description: Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP. Duration: 20s
Name: Bloodbath

Description: Nullifies all action direction requirements. Duration: 10s Maximum Charges: 2
Name: True North

Description: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects. Duration: 6s Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck Duration: 15s
Name: Arm's Length

Description: Lowers target's strength and dexterity by 10%. Duration: 10s
Name: Feint

Description: Stuns target. Duration: 3s
Name: Leg Sweep

Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you. Combo Action: Sonic Thrust Combo Potency: 230 Combo Bonus: Extends Blood of the Dragon duration by 10s to a maximum of 30s
Name: Coerthan Torment

Description: Delivers a jumping attack with a potency of 400. Returns you to your original position after the attack is made. Additional Effect: Grants Dive Ready Duration: 15s Cannot be executed while bound.
Name: High Jump

Description: Delivers a jumping fire-based attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 30% less for all remaining enemies. Can only be executed while under the effect of Life of the Dragon. Cannot be executed while bound.
